name: Almanzo 100

distances.name: 100 Mile
distances.description: Classic century through Minnesota Amish country on gravel roads

terrain: Minnesota gravel roads through Amish farmland - rolling hills, well-maintained gravel, scenic rural countryside
weather: Minnesota spring - variable conditions from cool (50s°F) to warm (70s°F), potential for rain or mud
uniqueCharacteristics: One of the oldest continuous gravel races in USA
Named after Almanzo Wilder from Little House on the Prairie
Limited to 350 riders maintaining intimate atmosphere
Roll-your-own race format with minimal support
Legendary status in gravel racing history
Post-race at Spring Valley City Park
